result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Amanda L Thomas

records.addlTxt:
10:10 AM Defendant Amanda L Thomas appeared by video, in custody from the Bayfield County Jail.  Attorney Ralph David Imholte appeared by video for Amanda L Thomas.  ADA Dennis Brown in court for State of Wisconsin. State/Defense speak to the case. Defense requests an adjournment. Bond continued.
Judicial Pretrial - in court scheduled for November 8, 2022 at 10:15 am.

11:36 AM Defendant Amanda L Thomas appeared by video, in custody Bayfield County Jail.  ADA Dennis Brown in court for State of Wisconsin.  Attorney Ralph David Imholte appeared by video for Amanda L Thomas. State calls Lac du Flambeau Police Investigator George Hopfensperger. Sworn and gives testimony. Amanda Thomas has been identified by the witness. Court finds probable cause in felony conduct. Defendant please not guilty. Bond Continued.
Judicial Pretrial - in court scheduled for September 20, 2022 at 10:00 am.

2:29 PM Defendant Amanda L Thomas appeared by video, in custody in Bayfield County Jail. ADA Brown appears in court for State of Wisconsin.  Attorney Ralph David Imholte appeared by video for Amanda L Thomas. Defendant states she was in Bayfield County during last hearing.  Court quashes warrant and reinstates prior signature bond.  Defense confirms receipt of criminal complaint, waive reading.  Bond continued.
Preliminary hearing scheduled for August 4, 2022 at 11:30 am.
Preliminary hearing on August 4, 2022 at 11:30 am.

records.descr: Demand for Discovery and Inspection - Defendant

records.addlTxt: 9:19 AM Defendant Amanda L Thomas not in court.  Attorney Karl Peter Hayes in court for State of Wisconsin. Defendant provided notice of today's hearing at last hearing.  Court authorizes bench warrant on non appearance - $1,000 Cash.
Public Defender Status of Counsel Report - 124 Contacts

1:23 PM Defendant appears by video from the Vilas County Jail without counsel.  ADA Dennis Brown appears for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant confirms receipt of criminal complaint.  Bond set at $2,500 Signature with conditions: Maintain absolute sobriety.  Bond form.
Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for June 20, 2022 at 09:00 am.
